dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform float red = 0.5;&#000a;uniform float green = 0.5;&#000a;uniform float blue = 0.5;&#000a;&#000a;vec4 textureColor = tex(TEXTURE, UV);&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * vec4(textureColor.r * red, textureColor.g * green, textureColor.b * blue, textureColor.a);&#000a; "
